document.full_text: new york governor andrew cuomo's budget plan gives some of his commissioners "unfettered power" to cut the medicaid program and close upstate prisons, the state comptroller said in a report on tuesday.
document.title: ny governor seeks "unfettered power" for commissioners
lines_and_colors: new york governor andrew cuomo's budget plan gives some of his commissioners "unfettered power" to cut the medicaid program and close upstate prisons, the state comptroller said in a report on tuesday.
